job_tasks.phrase: Als junior software engineer / data science werk je in multidisciplinaire teams
job_tasks.justification: Indicates working as a software engineer in a team setting, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werk aan projecten voor geavanceerde besturingssystemen voor machine- en apparatenbouw en systeemintegratie.
job_tasks.justification: Describes working on projects related to operating systems, machine building, and system integration, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je maakt graag realtime applicaties met embedded besturingssystemen zoals Linux, VxWorks, RTOS of Windows.
job_tasks.justification: Specifically mentions creating real-time applications with embedded operating systems, a common software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken aan diverse softwareoplossingen samen met een team van professionals
job_tasks.justification: Highlights developing software solutions in a team environment.

job_tasks.phrase: Applicatiesoftware en/of embedded software implementeren in een project
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the implementation of application software and embedded software.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken met LLM, kunstmatige intelligentie en AI technologieën
job_tasks.justification: Mentions working with LLMs and AI technologies, implying involvement in modeling or application of these technologies.
Refers to code optimization using compilers, a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Actief bezig zijn in de innovatieve machine- en apparatenbouw en systeemintegratie
job_tasks.justification: Indicates active involvement in machine building and system integration, which are software development domains.

job_tasks.phrase: Je kennis ontwikkelen door trainingen en cursussen

soft_skills.phrase: Je kennis ontwikkelen door trainingen en cursussen

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering, embedded systems, and system integration. While it mentions LLMs and AI technologies, it does not provide enough detail to suggest a specialization in GenAI model development or deployment. The primary emphasis is on software development tasks.
